## BaseEntityController.despawn() method

Override this method to handle the despawn of an entity from your entity controller.

**Signature:**

```typescript
despawn(entity: Entity): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

entity


</td><td>

[Entity](./server.entity.md)


</td><td>

The entity being despawned.

\*\*Category:\*\* Controllers


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

\*\*Called by:\*\* `Entity.despawn()` after `detach()` is called.

\*\*Super call:\*\* Call `super.despawn(entity)` to emit the `DESPAWN` event.
